Summary: I did not know I was capturing the objects in the photo. I was taking a picture of the mountains and the view.
divs: Sighting DetailsHello, my name is Vincent Sheppard. I was recently on a retreat with the organization I work for up in Mohonk Mountain Hotel. Mohonk Mountain is located in New Paltz, New York in the Catskill Mountains. While I was there I took several pictures with my cell phone camera of the beautiful country and the surrounding mountains along the Hudson River. When I got home and started to view the pics I had taken. I noticed that one of the pics appears to have something strange captured in it. I figured I would send it to MUFON and see what you guys think. This picture has not been altered in anyway. I took this picture, uploaded it from my cell phone to my email account, and when I got home downloaded it and several others. The picture that I'm sending you appears to have three red objects and a plane or jet chasing it. I know this sounds crazy, but please see for yourself. I would be happy to discuss this further if you have any questions. Thank You,
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in New Paltz
There were no other sightings in New Paltz on or around October 3rd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
